name: Under the Dust
description:
In the quiet village set at the foot of the mountains, disaster strikes! A landslide is headed right for the village, and whilst most folk are able to escape, not everyone is quite so lucky. Dig your way out of your ruined house and escape.

Created for Jamoween 2, an 8 day game Jam hosted by the Indie Game Squad. Check them out at https://www.indiegamesquad.co.uk/
